com.adamtaft.eb
Class EventBusService

java.lang.Object
  com.adamtaft.eb.EventBusService

public final class EventBusService
extends java.lang.Object

An EventBus factory that will return a singleton implementation loaded via the Java 6 ServiceLoader. By default, without changes to the jar, a BasicEventBus implementation will be returned via the factory methods.

This static factory also includes the same methods as EventBus which will delegate to the ServiceLoader loaded instance. Thus, the class creates a convenient single location for which client code can be hooked to the configured EventBus.

Author:
Adam Taft
